data.name: Skull Conductor
data.desc: If this card is face-up on the field at the end of the Battle Phase: Destroy this face-up card. You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; Special Summon up to 2 Zombie-Type monsters from your hand whose combined ATK is exactly 2000.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack
